name: BeyondInfinite
description:
Team Members- Arnav Kumar, Kanav Bhagat, Madhur Tandon, Yashit Maheshwary, Snehal Gupta

To shoot bullets, tap on the screen.

The ship can max collide 3 times with any asteroid.

All the destruction models are custom made on blender

The scoreboard and the health bar might not be visible due different screen resolutions (responsiveness).
